45.context_before: Get a better flute. The quality of the metal (whether nickel, silver,gold, or even platinum) and the craftsmanship that went into making a flute drastically affect its tone. 45.context_after:
Professional and intermediate flutes are crafted more precisely, and it is easier to get a good tone on many notes. Some features to consider:

* Open hole keys: These allow the air to go through when uncovered, and this leads to a fuller, more resonant tone. The open holes also create less air resistance, so it is easier to play notes.

 5.

108.context_after: * Make a big swooping motion with your hips to the front then to the right. * Finish the move by completing a circle with your hips to the back then to the front. * Keep your abdominal muscles tight and engaged as you do this. * Women will want to make this move very large and more dramatic, following the more natural way their hips curve.
